messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Tampopo
messages.msgSnippet: Yeah, all about food. And love. And food. And everything else. Great movie. Peggy
messages.messageBody:
Yeah, all about food. And love. And food. And everything else. Great
movie.

Peggy


aelanmichael@... wrote:
>
> In a message dated 1/14/02 6:57:44 AM Pacific Standard Time,
> AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:
>
> << Just recently saw the Japanese film _Tampopo_ by Juzo Itami again after
> many years. One of the scenes shows a woman nursing her baby. She calmly
> unbuttons her shirt, from the top, and sits on a park bench and feeds
> her child. Totally unselfconscious. >>
>
> Hey, I've seen this. This is the one where the woman's
> main goal in life is to make the perfect ramen right?
> I thought it was really funny.
>
> Andrea Kim :-)
> Full Time Mommy to

messages.subject: Tampopo
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/14/02 6:57:44 AM Pacific Standard Time, AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/14/02 6:57:44 AM Pacific Standard Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Just recently saw the Japanese film _Tampopo_ by Juzo Itami again after
many years. One of the scenes shows a woman nursing her baby. She calmly
unbuttons her shirt, from the top, and sits on a park bench and feeds
her child. Totally unselfconscious. >>

Hey, I've seen this. This is the one where the woman's
main goal in life is to make the perfect ramen right?
I thought it was really funny.


Andrea Kim :-)
Full Time Mommy to
Laura (2/16/96) & Allison (8/31/99)
Kent, WA,,,,,,,,soon to be Seattle!
